Reviews.Title: Picture Quality is fine. Sound is poor.
Reviews.Author: Jonathan D. Johnson
Reviews.Content: We got what we paid for.  This is bottom of the line.Bought this to go in a workout room.  Its only fed from a Roku or DVD player so we're not asking much of the picture quality.  We'll soon need speakers to go with it because the sound quality is really bad.Had we paid more it would get a lower rating.

Reviews.Title: Good starter TV for new HD
Reviews.Author: P. Eatherington
Reviews.Content: Good price, not the highest end model but I was making the switch from an old 19" tube and it worked great. No setup fuss. Stand is a little bit on the weak side if you have a rambunctious household. Good sound, nice clarity.

Reviews.Title: happy
Reviews.Author: bo
Reviews.Content: purchased this for a gift for my son.  He is very happy with the tv and had no problem with mounting on the wall.  The color is great and clear.  Hope this review helps you

ProductInfo.Features:

60 Hz Refresh Rate
ProductInfo.Name: Sceptre Inc. E325BD-HD 31.5-Inch LED-Lit 720p 60Hz HDTV (Black)
